channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-3437] 0.23 compatibility: fix unit tests when building against 0.23
item.description: Many unit tests fail as a result of building the code against hadoop 0.23. Initial focus will be to fix 0.9.
item.summary: 0.23 compatibility: fix unit tests when building against 0.23

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: Builds on the changes to the shim classes from this patch.
I'm actively working on this JIRA, but was not able to assign it to myself.
Assigned to Chris. Chris, also added you to contributors list. So, you can assign yourself any other jiras.
Draft of a 0.9 branch patch that addresses most unit test failures when building against hadoop 0.23.
Updated 0.9 patch and add trunk patch.

phabricator links for 0.9 and trunk patches respectively:

https://reviews.facebook.net/D5511
https://reviews.facebook.net/D5523
The patch addresses unit tests which fail when Hive is built against hadoop23 (0.23.1).
Comments on phabricator. Thanks.
New patches incorporating changes which address Carl's comments.

arc created a new phabricator link when updating trunk patch:

https://reviews.facebook.net/D5649
Fixed a bug which was causing minimrcluster tests to fail against hadoop 0.23.3.
@Chris: I left some more comments on phabricator. Thanks.
Updates that adrees reviewboard comments. Fix that gets NegativeMinimrCliDriver tests working with Hadoop 0.23.3.
Fixed tests: join14.q, sample_islocalmode_hook.q.
Fixed tests: join14.q, sample_islocalmode_hook.q, local_mapred_error_cache.q.
@Chris: I left some comments on phabricator. Please let me know what you think. Thanks.
Rebased patches.
@Chris: I added some comments here: https://reviews.facebook.net/D5649
Addressed more comments.
+1. Will commit if tests pass.
@Chris: This patch no longer applies cleanly due a bunch of changes that got committed on the 8th. Can you please rebase this on trunk? Thanks.
Rebased patch against latest changes.
@Chris: I found two more issues. Please see my comments on phabricator. Thanks.
Addressed phabricator comments.
Committed to trunk. Thanks Chris!
@Chris: Since 0.10.0 is imminent I doubt we're going to do an 0.9.1 release, but let me know if you still want this backported. Thanks.

Integrated in Hive-trunk-h0.21 #1795 (See https://builds.apache.org/job/Hive-trunk-h0.21/1795/)

We need these changes in the 0.9 branch, so please apply them there as well.

Thanks for your patience with this patch.
Backported to branch-0.9
